crypto.name: krotate
crypto.desc:
We managed to intercep communication with a critical mission. We can't decipher it but managed to break into the system and recover what looks like part of the communication and an algorithm for it.

Can you get the full message?

crypto.name: sat1sf1
crypto.desc:
Made my own hashing function sah652.

Here the super-secure hash of my secret: 2033251f4b3161e4455a4c261e3f631e18653c3a6c136e30304037373e6e1f6c6f6448673e686b1e18603d10306d323f3a4b626eee636c3c3c62483592123e6d6c6c3a49ca

Feeling generous to share some hints about my secret that you definitely will not able to recover:

Text length: 69 characters

Flag regex: CTF\{[a-f0-9]{64}\}

Flag contains somewhere the text: beebeef

forensic.name: wicked firmware
forensic.desc: We need some info that are found inside this firmware.

forensic.name: wicked monitoring
forensic.desc: Some weird events happened during this week. Please check and provide the necessary info.

misc.name: my bros are chaotic
misc.desc: Ma friends gave me tis after the bros had a great night. Find out what they say. Understand their language broo ! Flag format: ctf{...}

net.name: just an upload
net.desc: Our team captured this traffic. Can you find what's in there ?

net.name: secure communications
net.desc:
We captured some pretty bizzare looking communications, but part of them are encrypted.

Can you help?

net.name: sums up
net.desc: Our SOC analysts saw some strange DNS traffic. Wanted you to figure out what was exfiltated , can you check it and sum it up ?

pwn.name: harder assembly
pwn.desc: I want the shell, but they want me to work for it, this time even harder :(

rev.name: file factory
rev.desc: In the heart of a bustling metropolis lies a mysterious facility known only as the 'File-Factory.' Rumored to be the creation of a reclusive genius programmer, the File-Factory operates in secrecy, generating files of unknown purpose.

rev.name: pin
rev.desc: Get the pin and take the flag.

rev.name: wicked game
rev.desc: This game drives me crazy. It asks for an impossible score. Can you help me out? You need to catch the Android inside.
